== UK Met Office !DataPoint ==
External temperature data can be obtained using the [http://www.metoffice.gov.uk/datapoint UK Met Office DataPoint] datafeeds.

The Met Office also featured this software in their [http://www.metoffice.gov.uk/datapoint/showcase/heatmiser-scripts DataPoint showcase].
<td>
https://register.metoffice.gov.uk/WaveRegistrationClient/public/images/lg_mo.gif

http://icons.wxug.com/logos/images/wundergroundLogo_4c_horz.jpg
